docs.title: Welcome to the GEE Research Apps Portal
docs.text: Explore interactive Earth Engine applications, developed as part of our research work.

docs.title: About
docs.text: This portal showcases remote sensing and geospatial applications built using Google Earth Engine.

docs.title: Forest Watch App
docs.text:
• GEE Link: Launch App
  • Summary: This app visualizes NDVI trends over deforested regions.

docs.title: Urban Heat Map App
docs.text:
• GEE Link: Launch App
  • Summary: This app tracks urban heat islands using LST data.
